ai-mil3.7.6:1.2_0: “Sir, how many awakening factors are there?”
ai-mil3.7.6:1.5_0: “Great king, how the seven awakening factors burn investigation of principles.”
ai-mil3.7.6:1.6_0: “Well then, sir, is what is called the seven awakening factors?”
ai-mil3.7.6:1.7_0: “What do you think, great king? What do you think of them is worthless?”
ai-mil3.7.6:1.9_0: “In the same way, great king, investigation of the enlightenment factor, a fact that has not arisen for six factors.”
ai-mil3.7.6:3.1_0: the sixth enquiry is the sixth enlightenment factor.
